info.lead: The card shows which speakers or which parliamentary groups absolutely and relatively talk about a group of words the most.
info.text: We count the times a speaker says at least two search queries. Those, that said it at least once are ranked according to the number of occurrences divided by the number of all speeches of this speaker or parliamentary group and the total number of all speeches.

input-words: Enter a word or multiple words separated by a comma.
empty-text: To view results add at least two words.
wordgroups-text: Show me who talk about {words} the most. {load}
